text: Frances Rappaport Horwich (born Frances Rappaport; 16 July 1907 â€“ 22 July 2001) was, as Miss Frances, was an American television personality and educator. She was the host of the US children's television program, Ding Dong School. Horwich died of congestive heart failure on 22 July 2001 in Scottsdale, Arizona at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1907 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Deaths from congestive heart failure Category:Educators from Ohio Category:Entertainers from Ohio Category:Television personalities from Chicago Category:Educators from Chicago
title: Frances Horwich
